string.text: A backpack made of durable material able to withstand the most harsh weather conditions.
A portable sleeping bag designed to keep the user warm and hidden at night.
A durable backpack with various pouches and compartments equipped with quick release clips; giving the ability to drop the field kit at a moment's notice.
A kit containing oils and tools used for basic firearm maintenance. Useful when out exploring, but also quite heavy.
A makeshift kit of sewing equipment and spare materials for outfit maintenance. Useful for repairing holes and tears in armour.
A children's toolkit. Unlikely to be suitable for maintenance, but they could be useful in the hands of a thrifty technician.
A decent set of old tools, but despite their age they appear to be in good condition. A technician could probably make use of these.
A professional set of high quality tools for fine-tuning equipment. A technician could use these to fully modify a stalker's equipment.
